意大利傳媒報道，目前正閒賦在家的意大利籍領隊干地，以及即將卸任祖雲達斯CEO一職的馬路達（Giuseppe Marotta），或有機會在奧脫福球場再次合作，取代盛傳被炒的領隊摩連奴及曼聯CEO活華特。
周二《羅馬體育報》頭版報導，上周宣佈離開斑馬軍團的CEO馬路達，可能加盟曼聯成為新任體育總監，取代活華特的工作；而目前帥位危危乎的摩帥，曼聯亦可能會聘請前英超冠軍領隊干地執教，加上干地與馬路達曾在祖記合作，帶領該隊奪得意甲冠軍，這個組合或吸引到曼聯招手。
不過意媒報道指，曼聯就算對干地及馬路達感興趣，亦可能要面對同樣希望重建的AC米蘭競爭；但意媒稱目前AC米蘭仍對教練加度素感到信任，對馬路達的興趣反而更大。

https://hk.sports.appledaily.com/sports/realtime/article/20181002/58748848


傳干地

【now.com體育】曼聯主將保羅普巴、阿歷斯山齊士、盧卡古賽前在球員通道當領隊摩連奴透明，將帥不和進一步公開化，而名宿亦紛紛作出抨擊。已沒佳績支持的摩佬，如何是好？

曼聯周二歐聯分組賽主場與華倫西亞打成0:0，陣中將帥不和的情況明朗化，賽前摩連奴（Jose Mourinho）在球員通道與基斯史摩寧、勞基梳爾等聊天，保羅普巴、阿歷斯山齊士、盧卡古等人走過時，卻當摩連奴透明，既沒握手也沒打招呼，整個過程被電視鏡頭捕捉，好不尷尬！

將帥不和打出來的足球怎會好看？加上摩連奴保守的戰術悶蛋，並錄得領軍生涯以來首次連續4場不勝。名宿史高斯批評摩帥令球隊尷尬，不堪入目。「很沉悶的比賽，這還不是近10場如此，過去1年都打得悶。他賽後因得不到想要的賽果，就怨這怨那，令球隊更加難堪。」

前射手麥佳亞更忍不住在Twitter批評球隊，「教練、球員、戰術統統都是XX！曼聯要贏，就要比對手跑得更多、跑得更快！這完全是爭勝心的問題。」

【now.com體育】曼聯主將保羅普巴、阿歷斯山齊士、盧卡古賽前在球員通道當領隊摩連奴透明，將帥不和進一步公開化，而名宿亦紛紛作出抨擊。已沒佳績支持的摩佬，如何是好？

曼聯周二歐聯分組賽主場與華倫西亞打成0:0，陣中將帥不和的情況明朗化，賽前摩連奴（Jose Mourinho）在球員通道與基斯史摩寧、勞基梳爾等聊天，保羅普巴、阿歷斯山齊士、盧卡古等人走過時，卻當摩連奴透明，既沒握手也沒打招呼，整個過程被電視鏡頭捕捉，好不尷尬！

將帥不和打出來的足球怎會好看？加上摩連奴保守的戰術悶蛋，並錄得領軍生涯以來首次連續4場不勝。名宿史高斯批評摩帥令球隊尷尬，不堪入目。「很沉悶的比賽，這還不是近10場如此，過去1年都打得悶。他賽後因得不到想要的賽果，就怨這怨那，令球隊更加難堪。」

前射手麥佳亞更忍不住在Twitter批評球隊，「教練、球員、戰術統統都是XX！曼聯要贏，就要比對手跑得更多、跑得更快！這完全是爭勝心的問題。」

在周二的賽後新聞發佈會上，記者們就像上課一樣，拿住摩連奴的筆記，那份是曼聯對華倫西亞的長傳數據統計。

在發佈會上，摩連奴就像大學教授般，講解那份筆記，用數據證明泊大巴是胡說八道，“我們一直採用控球在腳的踢法，但踢了70分鐘都沒有顯著成效，所以我才改變踢法。有一個像費蘭尼的球員，我們當然踢得更簡單直接，但可惜並沒有取得入球，我認為這是領隊應有的判斷。”

“我們面對的是一支過去7年裏在歐戰要比曼聯更成功的球隊。你認為華倫西亞沒有球員能在我的球隊踢球嗎？華倫西亞隊內有許多球員可以在我的球隊踢球。”摩連奴在歐聯賽後新聞發佈會上説道。

“輕鬆的人生，球迷也沒有不開心，而且沒有批評聲音，那可不妙。如果你想要打造一支真正頂級的球隊，並且擁有頂級的精神力量，那麼你需要成長，最好的方式就是有這種感覺。”

“我不希望球迷降級期望值，我希望球迷擁有高期望值，因為我想要我的球員們也有高期望值。”

從摩連奴執教曼聯起，包括朗尼、舒尼達連、舒韋恩史迪加、迪比、贊奴沙在內的球員離開。葡萄牙人認為他的決定沒有錯。

“你知道上賽季有多少球員離開了這傢俱樂部嗎？看看他們現在在哪裏踢球，他們踢得如何，當然前提是他們有上場踢球的話。”

“舉例來説，在皇馬沒有出場踢球的球員，為了尋求出場時間離開後現在在哪裏，或者是因為俱樂部不想要留住他們。艾比奧爾和卡利祖，他們都是拿玻里頂級的球員。你再看看我們現在不在這裏踢球的球員。”

“也許有一天當我離開的時候，下一任曼聯主帥會發現盧卡古、馬迪，當然還有多年前來到俱樂部的迪基亞(是筆財產)。他們會找到擁有不同心態、質量、背景、地位和技能的球員。”

Manchester United captain Antonio Valencia has apologised for liking an Instagram post which called for manager Jose Mourinho to be sacked.

The 33-year-old, who reports said had fallen out with Mourinho, returned to the team for Tuesday's 0-0 draw with Valencia in the Champions League.

After the game, he liked a picture of himself which had the caption: "It's time for Mourinho to go".

The Ecuadorian later wrote he liked the post "without reading the text".

"These are not my views and I apologise for this," the full-back said on Twitter. "I am fully supportive of the manager and my team-mates. We are all giving our everything to improve the results."

Valencia, who joined United from Wigan in 2009, had missed United's previous two games - their Carabao Cup exit to Derby, and 3-1 defeat by West Ham in the Premier League.

They are 10th in the league after their worst start to a season in 29 years.

Keane slams unprofessional Manchester United players

This week during an interview for Notts TV, Roy Keane slammed all the Manchester United players who are letting their relationship with the manager get in the way of their livelihood as a professional football player.

“You talk about footballers and managers, not every player is going to get on with their manager and not every manager is going to like every player. But what you do as a footballer, and I’ve had one or two disagreements, when you cross that line you play for your team.”

“I don’t care what fallout you’ve had with your manager, I don’t care if you’ve been at each other’s throats. That is part of the industry. People do fall out. Unfortunately when you’re Man United, one of the biggest clubs in the world, things will get exaggerated.”

“And if you’re a footballer for Manchester United, you put that jersey on, you walk out and you don’t give 100 percent because you might be upset with somebody then good luck to Mourinho with this stuff,”

“There’s a lot of crybabies out there. When you walk out on that pitch you’re playing for your pride, you’re playing for your family, you’re playing for your city, whatever it might be.”

“Don’t get that worried about what the manager’s said about you, or the coaching staff, you get out there and play. You can follow it up after the match but when the game’s going on liven up. Play with pride, play with energy, play with spirit.”

“Hopefully play with a bit of skill. But on your bad days you roll your sleeves up and you fight for that jersey. Don’t get distracted by the balloons out there,” he concluded.

Keane slams unprofessional Manchester United players

This week during an interview for Notts TV, Roy Keane slammed all the Manchester United players who are letting their relationship with the manager get in the way of their livelihood as a professional football player.

“You talk about footballers and managers, not every player is going to get on with their manager and not every manager is going to like every player. But what you do as a footballer, and I’ve had one or two disagreements, when you cross that line you play for your team.”

“I don’t care what fallout you’ve had with your manager, I don’t care if you’ve been at each other’s throats. That is part of the industry. People do fall out. Unfortunately when you’re Man United, one of the biggest clubs in the world, things will get exaggerated.”

“And if you’re a footballer for Manchester United, you put that jersey on, you walk out and you don’t give 100 percent because you might be upset with somebody then good luck to Mourinho with this stuff,”

“There’s a lot of crybabies out there. When you walk out on that pitch you’re playing for your pride, you’re playing for your family, you’re playing for your city, whatever it might be.”

“Don’t get that worried about what the manager’s said about you, or the coaching staff, you get out there and play. You can follow it up after the match but when the game’s going on liven up. Play with pride, play with energy, play with spirit.”

“Hopefully play with a bit of skill. But on your bad days you roll your sleeves up and you fight for that jersey. Don’t get distracted by the balloons out there,” he concluded.

《雲高爾的四大死因》
花盡千金 冗員盡出
雲高爾入主曼聯短短兩季，花過億鎊，唯眾新兵未踢出大家的期望。上季有迪馬利亞天價加盟，踢過邊路、中場，可惜短短一季便出走法國兼重生，今季踢得風山水起，成為法甲助攻王。今季又一代表作－荷蘭親生仔迪比，當年在荷蘭國家隊提拔這名小將，來到曼聯翌季便將他收歸旗下，可惜踢得一事無成，今季更被青年軍的拉舒福特搶走風頭。

雖然雲高爾收購名單中仍有不少合格之作，如馬迪爾、白蘭特、靴里拉等等，但買十個先得兩個三個合格，相信一眾高層都不會滿意他的表現。

成績平淡 唯獨一冠
由費格遜的英超霸主年代，走到去莫耶斯的黑暗時期，曼聯球迷總希望自己球隊有一天能重番昔日的光彩。去季總算在英超奪得第四，重返歐冠之列。

可惜今季無以為繼，先論歐冠，小組賽便出局，名列第三，轉戰歐霸。怎料即使來到次一級的盃賽，遇到丹麥球隊米迪蘭特首回合仍見負，雖最終能反勝對手出線，但又遇到同國死敵利物浦，最終被對手淘汰出局，一大恥辱；後論聯賽，今季曼聯表現未見起色，對中下游球隊異常失準，曾輸過予般尼茅夫、新特蘭、諾域治，其實本來在最後階段可重返歐冠奪第四，但最終又在關鍵的比賽中輸給韋斯咸失分，緣絕歐聯。

戰術過時 用人混亂
曾有人稱雲高爾是戰術大師，看到他上季曾以三五二陣式出戰，及後又轉過四三三、四四二、四二三一等等不同陣式，但相信看過這兩季的比賽後，大家都不敢恭維。雲高爾近季以控球率見稱，但空有控球，卻毫無攻力可言，表現失色之下，大家都對他的戰術概念感到無比失望。

在雲帥的執教下，不同球員都經常出任不同的位置，白蘭特踢過左翼衛、中堅，朗尼例牌踢前鋒及中場(可能唔關雲高爾事，可能係佢自己話事)，最經典莫過於艾殊利楊格，踢過翼鋒、兩閘，甚至連前鋒都踢埋，不止球迷不滿，可能連球員本身對他的安排亦大惑不解。

罪不關己 怪責球迷
錯，不緊要，但最緊要認。雲高爾在兩季平平無奇的賽季後，直到近日他仍為球隊(抑或自己)找不同的藉口，他曾提及過曼聯現時未能重返高峰是因為球迷的期望太高，球隊現時是位於轉型階段；同時，他又指出曼聯陣中大多球員都沒有奪冠的經驗，「我們現在的球員，並不習慣當冠軍。我不認為達米安習慣，迪基亞亦從未成為過冠軍；朗尼、卡域克贏過一次，或者多過一次。你要知道球隊現時的情況，我們正在一個交接期。」

“There’s a lot of crybabies out there. When you walk out on that pitch you’re playing for your pride, you’re playing for your family, you’re playing for your city, whatever it might be.”

“Don’t get that worried about what the manager’s said about you, or the coaching staff, you get out there and play. You can follow it up after the match but when the game’s going on liven up. Play with pride, play with energy, play with spirit.”

“Hopefully play with a bit of skill. But on your bad days you roll your sleeves up and you fight for that jersey. Don’t get distracted by the balloons out there,” he concluded.

replies.msg:
唔太同意，咁樣根本做唔到人事管理，結果只係不繼換教練賠CONTRACT搵人去刷班大帝鞋。仲要每一個教練入主時點都會買幾個球員比佢，換下一個球練分分鐘又唔岩駛又要入過批，呢D根本唔叫做有成本效益。

正確做法係管理層先要制定長遠建軍策略，再以呢個原則去請合適風格教練，球員唔妥教練玩野就賣鬼走佢入過第二個啱用，咁樣成隊波同球員先能夠隱定咁發展成長。

鄰居管理層係呢點上真係值得學習，由文仙尼到工程師到哥狗一步步咁建立起歐陸式甚至話係西班牙式控傳打法，對領隊建軍收購亦都全力咁去支持，反之曼聯後費SIR年代曼聯管理層制定決策上亦都變得短視，關心盤數仲多過隊波。總之係由下到上都混亂不堪，咁攪法點換領隊都未必有效。

最有效同最痛做法係，重新制訂踢進攻足球方計去請過個領隊，同時亦都清洗班玩過野嘅大帝重建過球隊紀律，一定要維持球會利益最優先呢個方針。

球會管理層訂立明確方向 > 再請個能夠忠實執行方針嘅教練去管理球隊球員，咁先係最健康有效率做法。
